docs.lead_paragraph: WITH the approach of Christmas The New York Times today opens its forty-ninth annual appeal for New York City's Hundred Neediest Cases. and she sought refuge in drink. A year ago, after a violent quarrel with her husband Frank, 34, a restaurant worker she attempted suicide, and was committed to a mental hospital.
